fr.emn.easymol.gui
Class LibGUI

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--fr.emn.easymol.gui.LibGUI
public class LibGUI
extends java.lang.Object

The class to store all the methods used by the GUI to perform file operations.

It is used as a library.

Constructor Detail

LibGUI

public LibGUI()
Method Detail

createNewFile

public static void createNewFile(ToolBarWindow tb)
Ask the user the name and root atom of his molecule and creates a new VisualisationWindow. Also properly updates the ToolBarWindow fields.
Parameters:
tb - the mother window of the VisualisationWindow you want to create

save

public static java.lang.String save(VisualisationWindow visu,
                                    ToolBarWindow tb,
                                    boolean directSave)
The generic method to save a molecule. Handles all cases by itself (no window opened, modified Molecule...)
Parameters:
tb - a ToolBarWindow whose console will be used to write the messages to.
directSave - if the method has to be used as direct saving (i.e no JFileChooser). Still passes all the tests.
Returns:
theresult of the operation. Possibles values are : noVisuWin, noChangesToSave, savedAs, canceled and DirectSave.

allSaveCloseQuit

public static void allSaveCloseQuit(ToolBarWindow tb,
                                    boolean doClosed,
                                    boolean quit)
Generic method to arbitrary save all or close files. A quit option is also present.
Parameters:
tb - the ToolBarWindow whose console will be used to write the output messages to.
doClosed - if the frame must be closed.
quit - if we exit the application after performing the operation.

loadFromFile

public static void loadFromFile(ToolBarWindow tb)
Loads a molecule from a file on disk. Handles the case when no VisualisationWindow is available.
Parameters:
tb - The ToolBarWindow whose VisualisationWindow will be used to receive the molecule loaded

close

public static void close(VisualisationWindow visu,
                         boolean disappear)
Closes a VisualisationWindow and checks whether the molecule needs to be saved.
Parameters:
visu - the VisualisationWindow to close.
doClose - if the frame must also disappear.

notYetImplemented

public static void notYetImplemented()
Tells the user the feature is not present in this release. Used when commands are not implemented.

isFileTypeCorrect

public static boolean isFileTypeCorrect(java.io.File f)
Tests whether a filename ends with .xml or .XML
